short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gets rid of all those nasty little slurs that pop up online for LGBTQ+ people. Focuses on trans women.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This gets rid of most trans slurs there are, specifically ones targeted at women. There are some words that can't be removed without ruining normal sentences, so unfortunately i can't do that. There are also some very specific phrases that are transphobic that I can't brainstorm, so please email me at slurbegone.contact@gmail.com to have me add them to the list!
